public static class StripeStoreFlusher.SizeStripeFlushRequest extends StripeStoreFlusher.StripeFlushRequest
Stripe flush request wrapper based on size.

  • Constructor Details

    • SizeStripeFlushRequest

      public SizeStripeFlushRequest(CellComparator comparator, int targetCount, long targetKvs)
      Parameters:
      targetCount - The maximum number of stripes to flush into.
      targetKvs - The KV count of each segment. If targetKvs*targetCount is less than total number of kvs, all the overflow data goes into the last stripe.
